sentences.english: The complete success restaurant is a comprehensive hotel.
sentences.chinese: 满堂红酒楼是一家综合性酒店。

sentences.english: He has had all-round success in his study this term.
sentences.chinese: 他这学期的学习成绩夺得了满堂红。

sentences.english: " The firecracker, red, can break ground if brocade, called "ManTangGong".
sentences.chinese: 爆竹声后，碎红满地，灿若云锦，称为“满堂红”。

sentences.english: A full house, a real estate real estate intermediary to reporters Recommended Road.
sentences.chinese: 满堂红地产的一位地产中介向记者推荐道。

sentences.english: Our factory has had all-round success this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年我们厂是满堂红，各项指标都提前完成了。
